author: FRONTLINE PBS | Official
description:
Journalist Christo Grozev exposed Kremlin spies and assassins. In this video drawn from the new documentary "Antidote," he learns that he’s been added to a Kremlin “wanted” list — one in a series of escalating dangers as he continues his reporting. 

This journalism is made possible by viewers like you. Support your local PBS station here: https://www.pbs.org/donate​

Watch the full documentary starting May 6 on FRONTLINE's YouTube channel, on PBS stations, in the PBS App and at pbs.org/frontline.
title: How a Journalist Ended Up on the Kremlin’s Wanted List | Antidote | FRONTLINE
